item.title: Tips on Azure Certification AI-102 AI Engineer
item.description: In May 2024, I gained Azure Fundamentals and Azure AI Engineer certifications. I spent around 3 days of preparation and scored 854. Here are my tips on how to be more prepared and what you should do during the exam. Tip 1
